Title: Far Far Away Idol
Genre: Animation, Short, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Music
Actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Antonio Banderas
Plot: Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.
